Class userPListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.userPListController

  • public class userPListController
extends java.lang.Object

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage mainstage,
                  userlist us,
                  albumList as,
                  album a,
                  int index)
        start the GUI and the controller by filling the following data
        Parameters:
        mainstage - the stage it is on
        us - a list of all users
        as - an albumlist of this user
        a - an album of this user you want to diplay
        index - the index of the user in the userlist
